list.title: V4.49t Release Notes
list.description: Was supposed to be a major update, but too much work.
updates: This includes certain bypassing methods and false positives where you couldn't say living room, skyscraper, etc.
This includes changes where new players won't be able to use private, recently created, moderated, or non-decal images.
Better mobile controls, better handling, improved details (CLS55), improved sounds (Perquen 900 GT, RS6/RS7, BNS Arc-M5)
Fixed an issue where shadows and outlines were visible through morphs.
Haven't fixed it for CW morphs yet.
Fixed issues with the overhead GUI.
Should work most of the time, rainbow tags were fixed as well.
Fixed an issue where keybinds/controls activated when typing.
Roblox introduced changes to their engine without notice that caused this issue in many games.

Beginning from January 2026, users will be required to verify their age in order to chat, and will be only to chat within similar/close age grouos. The overhead (next to username) will indicate if the user can't globally chat, or can't communicate with you/you can't communicate with them. Messages sent from different age groups will show in the chat as hidden.
Implemented typing status to the chat interface.

Staff can spawn buses in the city map and do routes/shifts. No timetables yet. Stops and routes are currently limited, they will be expanded, fully functional, and available for all when the city map is expanded/big enough.

list.title: V4.49s Release Notes
updates: Added more terms to the filter/word blacklist system.
As always, TMP puts community safety and player experience first.
Done some optimization to the game.

list.title: V4.49r Release Notes
updates: Made improvements to the filter system.
Done some optimization to the game.
As always, TMP puts community safety and player experience first.

list.title: V4.49q Release Notes
updates: Done some optimization to the game.

list.title: V4.49p Release Notes
updates: Fixed yet another issues with Adonis Admin. (i hope so)
I recently implemented a vehicle-player collision system, and forgot to make some adjustments.
Done some optimization to the game.
Improved performance, Changing UI colors is faster, sliders are smoother, etc.
Fixed issues related to vehicles and other stuff.
Updated the partnerships screen in the lobby.

list.title: V4.49o Release Notes
updates: Expanded the hangout area and done some improvements in the lobby.
Done some optimizations to the game.
Fixed some issues with Adonis Admin.

list.title: V4.49n Release Notes
updates: Fixed a vulnerability that allowed exploiters to change everyone's data.
Affected RP names, morphs, etc. of players in a certain server.
Replaced HD Admin with Adonis Admin.
Migration of certain commands is still in progress.
Done some optimization to the game.

list.title: V4.49m Release Notes
updates: Done some optimization to the game.
Fixed an issue where the rules GUI didn't appear for some.
Fixed an issue where the market proximity prompt didn't show.

list.title: V4.49l Release Notes
updates: Done some optimization to the game.
Added a new vehicle - Shok EV3

Mecredenz CLS55: Exhaust burble sounds.
Mecredenz Urbano: Overhauled collision

list.title: V4.49k Release Notes
updates: Fixed issues related to the morph GUI.

list.title: V4.49j Release Notes
updates: Opening certain UIs shouldn't lag anymore.
Visually worse when opening/closing, but performance is improved.
Reclarified some things, and fixed an issue where you couldn't exit.
Volume of boomboxes are now even.
Thanks to CompressorSoundEffect, it makes an even volume for the audio.
Fixed an issue where feedback and report systems didn't work
They were inconsistent, and no longer needed since scaling is pretty much good as of now.

list.title: V4.49i Release Notes
updates: Improved stability and faster responses in the image and audio library.
Done some optimizations to the game.
Upgraded the chassis, and it can be driven on mobile.

list.title: V4.49h Release Notes
updates: Fixed an issue where the unmuteradio command would make radios very loud.

list.title: V4.49g Release Notes
updates: Fixed an issue where you couldn't teleport to certain maps.
ERPSearcher checks if a player is a known violator and kicks them if found.
Made some improvements to the city map.
Roads, vehicles, and road signs are accurately sized. Some reworks were done.
BNS Arc-M5 (Engine sounds), Mecredenz CLS55 (general improvements)
In the future, color customization will be implemented.
Improved the vehicle license plate system.
Improved design, reworked polish plate, added an option to toggle region-based plates in settings.
Improved the image and audio blacklist system.
False positives might occur. Report them if necessary.

list.title: V4.49f Release Notes
updates: Fixed an issue where the suspension on the 'Mecredenz Urbano' was broken.
Fixed streaming for the school map.
(no longer falling through in most cases)

list.title: V4.49e Release Notes
updates: Fixed an issue where you couldn't teleport to some maps.
Fixed an issue where doors on the 'Bugger Werona' were broken.

list.title: V4.49c Release Notes
updates: Fixed an issue related to maps.
Teleporting to FNF maps, not teleporting back to map when falling through.
Moved the back button in the maps UI to the right.
Fixed an issue with the block system.
Fixed an issue where polls didn't work.

list.title: V4.49b Release Notes
updates: Fixed an issue related to streaming — booths and market.
Fixed an issue where the agree button doesn't show up for new players.

list.title: V4.49a Release Notes
updates: TMP now uses streaming for maps.
This will improve performance for most people.
Fixed an issue where the text sign doesn't work.

Instead of something like VX.YY.ZZ, it will be VX.YY (a).
(a) - patch suffix representing small updates and hotfixes.
Made improvements to the city map. (WIP)
Replaced/added areas, some optimizations, improved decorations
Made some improvements to the anti-cheat.
Fixed an issue where the current morph in the player list doesn't update.
Fixed an issue where the group role shows up as 'Guest' in player info.

list.title: V4.49.49 Release Notes
updates: Fixed an issue where cars didn't spawn properly.
Fixed an issue where some parts in vehicles weren't welded.
Rules will only have to be acknowledged once, or after getting unbanned or warned.
Made some improvements to the city map.
> Mainly performance improvements and tiny changes.
Improved the gauge cluster for Adira vehicles.

list.title: TMP Is Back
list.description: TMP was temporarily unavailable due to falsely getting moderated by Roblox, but now it's restored.
updates: TMP has been falsely moderated by Roblox's automation a while ago, causing players to move to an unstable version of TMP.

list.title: V4.49.48 Release Notes
updates: Fixed an issue where cars didn't spawn.
Fixed an issue where some parts in vehicles weren't welded.

list.title: V4.49.47 Release Notes
updates: Made some improvements to the city map.
Bypassing certain words using escape characters is no longer possible.
Moved the market building (inside) to the lobby.
Fixed an issue where the sit button doesn't work.
Fixed an issue where searching maps doesn't work.
Added country/region-based license plates for vehicles.
Made an improvement to the rules GUI.
Now a player has to acknowledge every rule before playing the game, so they're less likely to violate the rules.
Most likely fixed an issue where all overhead tags are rainbow.
Added Discord Rich Presence to Bloxstrap users.
Shows in which map you currently are.

list.title: V4.49.46 Release Notes
updates: Fixed anomalies in the city map.
Poll logs (staff only), more args (staff, coowners, supervisors, etc), and qualifiers (map, cars)

list.title: V4.49.45 Release Notes
updates: We're adding morphs and maps from various fandoms, so we decided to rebrand Comedy World RP Fixed to The Multiverse Project.
Fixed an issue where players can push the city bus.
Fixed anomalies in the city map.

list.title: V4.49.44 Release Notes
updates: Fixed road signs on city map.
Now correct signs (caution signs) are used on highway and tunnel curves instead of mandatory/enforcement signs to avoid confusion.
Fixed an issue where a certain car could be heard all over the game.
Made cars a bit faster, removed jeep super speed, etc.

list.title: V4.49.43 Release Notes
updates: Fixed road markings on city map.
Fixed an issue where you can't teleport to the CW city map.
Now it's less likely to false ban.
We are continuing to improve CWRPF.

list.title: V4.49.42 Release Notes
updates: Fixed mobile control for some vehicles.
Fixed an issue where some GUIs don't work.
Added an Audi RS6 to the city map (car spawners).
Currently the best available car model in CWRPF speaking of features and quality.

list.title: V4.49.40 Release Notes
updates: Now it has better cars, a bus, and many more things. (check it out)
Added a channel bar to the chat
Roblox brought back this feature. It hasn't been in CWRPF since 2022-23.
Updated the phone prop GUI (same as baconifyUI but no blurs)
Implemented multiple map zones and areas.
Mainly made for large maps like the city map.
Fixed an issue where the image and audio library don't work.
Fixed an issue where the padding between player headshot and morph were broken.
Transfer points and high graphics option sunsetting.
No one uses these features and/or they're broken.
This includes adding better outlines/borders for some elements and better positioning/aligning.

list.title: V4.49.38 Release Notes
updates: Added 3 new maps: Sprunki background, Sprunki horror background, and City (work in progress).
Keep in mind that the city map is unfinished and is mostly empty.
Fixed an issue where search bar is unusable.
Fixed an issue where the lobby season system didn't update properly for winter.
This includes adding better outlines/borders for some elements and better positioning/aligning.

list.title: V4.49.31 Release Notes
updates: Fixed an issue where permanently banned players get automatically unbanned.
Fixed an issue where staff can't close the ban gui.

list.title: V4.49.30 Release Notes
updates: Candy Hunt event is here! (Until November 1) Earn 15-40 points per candy.
Fixed an issue where the glow effect is way too bright.
This was caused by Roblox's new Lighting system.
Revamped topbar. (new icons, can position to right)
Improved player list (shows max. 4 badges, fixed animations, username can be copied)
Added more customization to the booths. (show image, text, both, or none, image scale type, booth color)
Implemented a feature where the lobby theme changes based on the season and event. (winter, new years, christmas, fall, default)
Fixed an issue where extra props from the old lobby are still available in the new lobby.
Improved the admin system. (new ban GUI, Roblox Ban API)
Added more features to the CWRPF framework. (color changer, select values)
Added a 'reset configurations' option in settings.
Maybe other stuff i didn't include here (forgot).

list.title: V4.49.27 Release Notes
updates: Fixed an issue where the player list sometimes doesn't work.

list.title: V4.49.26 Release Notes
updates: Added more blacklisted keywords to the image library.

list.title: V4.49.25 Release Notes
updates: Added category and creator info, and brand new layout.
Improved icons/badges in the player list and player info.
Fixed an issue where the inventory is visible despite being closed.
Fixed an issue where the morph GUi is broken sometimes.
Fixed an issue where booths are still claimed even if the player left.

list.title: V4.49.20 Release Notes
updates: Revamped the lobby and added booths/stands.
First full lobby redesign/revamp in CWRPF.
Fixed an issue where the player list doesn't work sometimes.
Fixed an issue where the inventory/backpack hotbar has broken scaling.
When opening the morph GUI first time, the image library will be shown instead of CW morphs.
Implemented an add/remove promocode command, owner only.
On Desktop/Tablet, the default UI scale is 0.9. On Mobile, it's 1.25. Customized values are only applied for the current device type (e.g. Desktop).

list.title: V4.49.10 Release Notes
updates: Fixed an issue where people don't earn points.
Made a mistake in the points script which made it unusable.
Descriptions with no description will not be shown in the changelog.

list.title: V4.49.8 Release Notes
updates: Fixed an issue where the image and audio library don't work.
Fixed an issue where Amburn falsely bans people sometimes.

list.title: V4.49.7 Release Notes
updates: Staff can now blacklist images or audios using the blacklistid command. Example: blkid 12345,123456,772727

list.title: V4.49.6 Release Notes
updates: It was V4.49.9 (not accurate), but now, it's V4.49.5.

list.title: V4.49.5 Release Notes
updates: Added the anniversary badge and lobby props.
If you join this experience during June 12-13, you'll get an anniversary badge.
Added more audios to the bacon's catalog in the audio library.
Fixed issues with the audio library.
This includes the close button not working for exclusive audios, no results text not showing up, etc.
Added an option to disable auto-morph and topbar click effect when joining the experience.
Fixed issues with the Amburn anti-cheat.

list.title: V4.49.2 Release Notes
updates: Fixed an issue where the anti-cheat system automatically bans you for using the fly command.

list.title: V4.49.1 Release Notes
updates: We have implemented Amburn, Wonderstars's proprietary anti-cheat engine used in 2DIRP, to prevent exploit attempts.
Fixed a bug where the 'no results' text doesn't show up in the audio library.
Fixed a bug where the close button for exclusive audios isn't working.
Fixed a bug where the egg hunt event didn't fully end after May 1.
Fixed a bug where the co-owner tag shows up as [Tag] or nothing.
Fixed a bug where featured images don't show up properly.

list.title: V4.49 Release Notes
list.description: <s>Last update before V4.5 unless there are more bugs.</s>

list.title: V4.47 Release Notes
updates: Fixed an issue where the report feature is broken.
It should work, but still partially broken.
Blacklisted several disturbing images which show up on the front page.

list.title: V4.46 Release Notes
updates: Fixed an issue where report feature is broken.
Untested. Let us know if it's still broken.

list.title: V4.45 Release Notes
updates: Fixed an issue where the RP Name placeholder (N/A) is visible.

list.title: V4.42 Release Notes
updates: The Egg Hunt event has been unveiled.
Available during April. Rewards can be collected until the end of May. Added a new egg: CaseOh Egg.
added tomfooleru day stuff and more and other stuff etc
Improved the cooldown when rapidly opening and closing the menu. (small detail)
Added the bean from 2D Image Roleplay's lobby.
Since Baconify Games is partnering with WonderStars, we decided to add the bean to the lobby which can be found in 2D Image Roleplay's lobby.

list.title: V4.40 Release Notes
updates: Blacklisted 2 users and fixed the blacklist system.

list.title: V4.38 Release Notes
updates: Fixed an issue where user settings don't save and where the block feature doesn't work sometimes.

list.title: V4.37 Release Notes
list.description: Fixed a major bug regarding the image library.
updates: Fixed an issue where the image library doesn't load.
Fixed an issue where the image library, recent images, and favorite images don't load at all.

list.title: V4.35 Release Notes
list.description: Yet another bug fix and improvement update.
updates: V4.5 is coming in a few weeks or months.
V4.5 aka the next major update will feature a new lobby, improved UIs, brand new name & look, etc.
Changed the winter lobby to the regular lobby and removed christmas props.
Fixed some bugs reported by players for better experience, including broken settings, props volume not saving, etc.
This might fix some issues related to recent images not saving.
Improved notification (default) and image, audio library & morph UI (search and preferences button) animations (usually cooldown and snapiness).

list.title: V4.27 Release Notes
list.description: Major bug fixes for CWRPF. This is the last update before the next major update V4.5 releases. (Unless more bugs or issues are found)
updates: Fixed many bugs reported by players for better experience.

list.title: V4.22 Release Notes
list.description: Small improvements and features for CWRPF.
updates: <s>Added a feature where the player list color is based on the headshot color.</s>
Since Roblox implemented EditableImage, we decided to use it here (removed because it's still in beta and not available in-game yet). More coming soon.
Since 2023 is ending, we decided to add a new year countdown. It also has been revamped.

list.title: V4.16 Major improvements
updates: Migrated the changelog to a UI.
We have decided to migrate the changelog from the lobby to a UI for easier access.
Added over 10 morphs from the upcoming Go!Animate movie.
Added about 13 morphs from the upcoming Go!Animate movie. This includes Ms. Mouth, Ground, Brian Schmidt, Richie Verdi, Mateo, Limmy, Grayson, etc.
Since we added non-comedy world morphs, we decided to rename this experience to 'Go!Animate Roleplay'. This brought worse reputation to the game so we decided to revert the name back.
Added image banner, descriptions, cleaner UI, etc.
Roblox recently released a subscription feature so we decided to add a supporter+! subscription with more perks for $2.99/month.
This includes UI lags, UI color customization interfering with some UIs, morph system being partially broken for certain avatar sizes, props/decorations not being anchored, etc.

list.title: Older Updates
list.description: Previous updates before full changelog UI.
updates: Fixed a bug where the report feature doesn't work (V4.15).
Probably fixed a bug where the agree button is not working in the rules UI (V4.15).
Fixed a bug where entering a page value temporarily breaks the audio library (V4.15).
Fixed a bug where you can't favorite an image/audio on the 2nd time (V4.15).
Fixed a bug where the image library marketplace is unusable after switching to the favorites/recent tab (V4.13).
Fixed an issue where the animation speed doesn't apply properly for some UI elements.
Improved the phone prop UI a bit (V4.12). Fixed the UI scaling (V4.13)
Changed the lobby theme to winter.
Partially fixed UI Scale customization and Overhead UI.
Improved the update log layout (json) so adding new logs is way easier.
Partially fixed the overhead UI and map teleport system.
Fixed a bug where the hint text for the player list button didn't show up.
Added immersive ads. (not sure if they will work)
Added more supporter perks. Larger image size (up to 15) and expanded RP name limit.
Fixed an issue where players couldn't find the brick egg.
Added a chat tag color command (for rank 3 and higher).
Probably fixed a bug where the overhead UI's offset is set to way different values (i.e. it appears at the bottom) or doesn't show up.
Removed topbar icon color customization due to a bug causing it to change to random colors.
Fixed a bug where sliders/progress bars have a smaller maximum value than expected.
Added haptic feedback for topbar buttons and notifications (you can toggle it in settings).
Fixed a bug where some toggles aren't applying options properly.
Partially fixed a bug where the topbar icon color changes to a random color.
Added UI color customization support for the chat UI.
Fixed a bug where the player info breaks in some cases.
Fixed a bug where the overhead UI adder script fails to find the player's character.
You can join the legacy version of CWRP (stable) and the first version of CWRP ever. (In tunnel > more games)
Changing the UI scale breaks scrolling frames.
Fixed a bug where the overhead UI breaks when is added again while applying the RP name while sitting.
Fixed a bug where the offset value shows as 6 but is actually 0.
Fixed a bug where hiding the front image ID hides it, but it shows as 'ID:'.
Fixed a bug when the audio ID is changed using the text box, the audio name is not applied.
Fixed a bug where the favorite button doesn't work in the image library..
Fixed a bug where selecting an audio from the audio library doesn't detect if it's favorited or not.
